attributes.action: Provide all NHS staff with a years tax break.
attributes.additional_details:
They worked long shifts, many without regular breaks covering overtime shifts for their colleagues who were either dying from covid or off sick shielding. 
Any extra wages they earnt were eaten up in taxes!!
Providing them all with a set tax break or at the very least a tax reduction will go someway to thank them all for their hardwork & dedication during this time.
attributes.background: During the covid pandemic many NHS staff worked long, arduous hours wearing heavy PPE in the most horrific conditions.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Exempt NHS staff from paying income tax: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554019

Give NHS workers a higher tax free income threshold: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578220

Stop deducting Tax and NI from our NHS workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572153
